Interface ActionService

    • Method Detail

      • create

        Action create​(Action action,
              int empId,
              int pointActionId)
       throws IllegalActionException
        Creates and saves a given action in the data base with inserted employee and point action.
        Parameters:
        action - the point action to create.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        pointActionId - point action's id to insert.
        Returns:
        the created object.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - if an employee has no permit for this action at the control point.

      • update

        void update​(Action action,
            int empId,
            int pointActionId)
     throws NotFoundException,
            IllegalActionException
        Updates an existing in the data base action with inserted employee and point action.
        Parameters:
        action - the point action to create.
        empId - the employee's id to insert.
        pointActionId - point action's id to insert.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if there aren't updated object in the data base.
        IllegalActionException - if an employee has no permit for this action at the control point.

      • getAllByEmplId

        java.util.List<Action> getAllByEmplId​(int id)
        Returns the list with all absences by employee's id.
        Parameters:
        id - the employee's id.
        Returns:
        all actions which are done.

      • getAllBetween

        java.util.List<Action> getAllBetween​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Returns all actions in the specified time interval.
        Parameters:
        start - the start of the time interval.
        end - the end of the time interval.
        Returns:
        all actions in the specified time interval sorted with specified sort.
